description:
Extra-wide platforms expand the contact surface between cleats and pedals, for efficient power transfer and a solid feeling when you stand on them. Whatever your road-riding level, these are good things.

  • Lightweight composite body
  • Durable, replaceable stainless steel plate reduces flex and body wear
  • Extra-large entry target for easier engagement
  • Wide bearing placement for stable, uniform load distribution
  • Supplied with SM-SH11 cleat with 6° of float for comfort. Excellent for riders whose feet move naturally during their pedal stroke
  • Optional cleats include fixed SM-SH10 and front-center-pivoting SM-SH12
name: Shimano PD-R550 SPD-SL Pedals
